00037 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LLITE
00038 
00039 #include <linux/module.h>
00040 #include <linux/types.h>
00041 #include <linux/version.h>
00042 #include <lustre_ha.h>
00043 #include <lustre_dlm.h>
00044 #include <linux/init.h>
00045 #include <linux/fs.h>
00046 #include <lprocfs_status.h>
00047 #include "llite_internal.h"
00048 #include "vvp_internal.h"
00049 
00050 static struct kmem_cache *ll_inode_cachep;
00051 
00052 static struct inode *ll_alloc_inode(struct super_block *sb)
00053 {
00054         struct ll_inode_info *lli;
00055         ll_stats_ops_tally(ll_s2sbi(sb), LPROC_LL_ALLOC_INODE, 1);
00056         OBD_SLAB_ALLOC_PTR_GFP(lli, ll_inode_cachep, GFP_NOFS);
00057         if (lli == NULL)
00058                 return NULL;
00059 
00060         inode_init_once(&lli->lli_vfs_inode);
00061         return &lli->lli_vfs_inode;
00062 }
00063 
00064 #ifdef HAVE_INODE_I_RCU
00065 static void ll_inode_destroy_callback(struct rcu_head *head)
00066 {
00067         struct inode *inode = container_of(head, struct inode, i_rcu);
00068         struct ll_inode_info *ptr = ll_i2info(inode);
00069         OBD_SLAB_FREE_PTR(ptr, ll_inode_cachep);
00070 }
00071 
00072 static void ll_destroy_inode(struct inode *inode)
00073 {
00074         call_rcu(&inode->i_rcu, ll_inode_destroy_callback);
00075 }
00076 #else
00077 static void ll_destroy_inode(struct inode *inode)
00078 {
00079         struct ll_inode_info *ptr = ll_i2info(inode);
00080         OBD_SLAB_FREE_PTR(ptr, ll_inode_cachep);
00081 }
00082 #endif
00083 
00084 /* exported operations */
00085 struct super_operations lustre_super_operations =
00086 {
00087         .alloc_inode   = ll_alloc_inode,
00088         .destroy_inode = ll_destroy_inode,
00089 #ifdef HAVE_SBOPS_EVICT_INODE
00090         .evict_inode   = ll_delete_inode,
00091 #else
00092         .clear_inode   = ll_clear_inode,
00093         .delete_inode  = ll_delete_inode,
00094 #endif
00095         .put_super     = ll_put_super,
00096         .statfs        = ll_statfs,
00097         .umount_begin  = ll_umount_begin,
00098         .remount_fs    = ll_remount_fs,
00099         .show_options  = ll_show_options,
00100 };
00101 
00102 
00103 void lustre_register_client_process_config(int (*cpc)(struct lustre_cfg *lcfg));
00104 
00105 static int __init lustre_init(void)
00106 {
00107         struct proc_dir_entry *entry;
00108         lnet_process_id_t lnet_id;
00109         struct timeval tv;
00110         int i, rc, seed[2];
00111 
00112         CLASSERT(sizeof(LUSTRE_VOLATILE_HDR) == LUSTRE_VOLATILE_HDR_LEN + 1);
00113 
00114         /* print an address of _any_ initialized kernel symbol from this
00115          * module, to allow debugging with gdb that doesn't support data
00116          * symbols from modules.*/
00117         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "Lustre client module (%p).\n",
00118                &lustre_super_operations);
00119 
00120         ll_inode_cachep = kmem_cache_create("lustre_inode_cache",
00121                                             sizeof(struct ll_inode_info),
00122                                             0, SLAB_HWCACHE_ALIGN, NULL);
00123         if (ll_inode_cachep == NULL)
00124                 GOTO(out_cache, rc = -ENOMEM);
00125 
00126         ll_file_data_slab = kmem_cache_create("ll_file_data",
00127                                                  sizeof(struct ll_file_data), 0,
00128                                                  SLAB_HWCACHE_ALIGN, NULL);
00129         if (ll_file_data_slab == NULL)
00130                 GOTO(out_cache, rc = -ENOMEM);
00131 
00132         ll_remote_perm_cachep = kmem_cache_create("ll_remote_perm_cache",
00133                                                   sizeof(struct ll_remote_perm),
00134                                                   0, 0, NULL);
00135         if (ll_remote_perm_cachep == NULL)
00136                 GOTO(out_cache, rc = -ENOMEM);
00137 
00138         ll_rmtperm_hash_cachep = kmem_cache_create("ll_rmtperm_hash_cache",
00139                                                    REMOTE_PERM_HASHSIZE *
00140                                                    sizeof(struct hlist_head),
00141                                                    0, 0, NULL);
00142         if (ll_rmtperm_hash_cachep == NULL)
00143                 GOTO(out_cache, rc = -ENOMEM);
00144 
00145         entry = lprocfs_register("llite", proc_lustre_root, NULL, NULL);
00146         if (IS_ERR(entry)) {
00147                 rc = PTR_ERR(entry);
00148                 CERROR("cannot register '/proc/fs/lustre/llite': rc = %d\n",
00149                        rc);
00150                 GOTO(out_cache, rc);
00151         }
00152 
00153         proc_lustre_fs_root = entry;
00154 
00155         cfs_get_random_bytes(seed, sizeof(seed));
00156 
00157         /* Nodes with small feet have little entropy. The NID for this
00158          * node gives the most entropy in the low bits. */
00159         for (i = 0;; i++) {
00160                 if (LNetGetId(i, &lnet_id) == -ENOENT)
00161                         break;
00162 
00163                 if (LNET_NETTYP(LNET_NIDNET(lnet_id.nid)) != LOLND)
00164                         seed[0] ^= LNET_NIDADDR(lnet_id.nid);
00165         }
00166 
00167         do_gettimeofday(&tv);
00168         cfs_srand(tv.tv_sec ^ seed[0], tv.tv_usec ^ seed[1]);
00169 
00170         rc = vvp_global_init();
00171         if (rc != 0)
00172                 GOTO(out_proc, rc);
00173 
00174         cl_inode_fini_env = cl_env_alloc(&cl_inode_fini_refcheck,
00175                                          LCT_REMEMBER | LCT_NOREF);
00176         if (IS_ERR(cl_inode_fini_env))
00177                 GOTO(out_vvp, rc = PTR_ERR(cl_inode_fini_env));
00178 
00179         cl_inode_fini_env->le_ctx.lc_cookie = 0x4;
00180 
00181         rc = ll_xattr_init();
00182         if (rc != 0)
00183                 GOTO(out_inode_fini_env, rc);
00184 
00185         lustre_register_client_fill_super(ll_fill_super);
00186         lustre_register_kill_super_cb(ll_kill_super);
00187         lustre_register_client_process_config(ll_process_config);
00188 
00189         RETURN(0);
00190 
00191 out_inode_fini_env:
00192         cl_env_put(cl_inode_fini_env, &cl_inode_fini_refcheck);
00193 out_vvp:
00194         vvp_global_fini();
00195 out_proc:
00196         lprocfs_remove(&proc_lustre_fs_root);
00197 out_cache:
00198         if (ll_inode_cachep != NULL)
00199                 kmem_cache_destroy(ll_inode_cachep);
00200 
00201         if (ll_file_data_slab != NULL)
00202                 kmem_cache_destroy(ll_file_data_slab);
00203 
00204         if (ll_remote_perm_cachep != NULL)
00205                 kmem_cache_destroy(ll_remote_perm_cachep);
00206 
00207         if (ll_rmtperm_hash_cachep != NULL)
00208                 kmem_cache_destroy(ll_rmtperm_hash_cachep);
00209 
00210         return rc;
00211 }
00212 
00213 static void __exit lustre_exit(void)
00214 {
00215         lustre_register_client_fill_super(NULL);
00216         lustre_register_kill_super_cb(NULL);
00217         lustre_register_client_process_config(NULL);
00218 
00219         lprocfs_remove(&proc_lustre_fs_root);
00220 
00221         ll_xattr_fini();
00222         cl_env_put(cl_inode_fini_env, &cl_inode_fini_refcheck);
00223         vvp_global_fini();
00224 
00225         kmem_cache_destroy(ll_inode_cachep);
00226         kmem_cache_destroy(ll_rmtperm_hash_cachep);
00227         kmem_cache_destroy(ll_remote_perm_cachep);
00228         kmem_cache_destroy(ll_file_data_slab);
00229 }
00230 
00231 MODULE_AUTHOR("OpenSFS, Inc. <http://www.lustre.org/>");
00232 MODULE_DESCRIPTION("Lustre Client File System");
00233 MODULE_VERSION(LUSTRE_VERSION_STRING);
00234 MODULE_LICENSE("GPL");
00235 
00236 module_init(lustre_init);
00237 module_exit(lustre_exit);
